Vulnerabilities.Title: BusyBox Minor Information Disclosure
Vulnerabilities.Description: Minor information disclosure vulnerability in BusyBox that may leak limited system information through error messages.

Vulnerabilities.Title: Musl C Library Edge Case
Vulnerabilities.Description: Edge case vulnerability in musl C library that may cause minor issues in very specific usage scenarios.

Vulnerabilities.Title: Redis Configuration Exposure
Vulnerabilities.Description: Low severity vulnerability in Redis that may expose configuration details through debug commands when debug mode is enabled.

Vulnerabilities.Title: Alpine Base Layout Minor Issue
Vulnerabilities.Description: Minor issue in Alpine base layout that has minimal security impact and requires local access to exploit.
